thread.title: Get ready to cheer for your favourite team at the FIFA U-17 & Formula One

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Get ready to cheer for your favourite team at the FIFA U-17 & Formula One
text:
By Rashmi Hemrajani 
The excitement of a live sporting spectacle is a unique experience, absorbing the palpable excitement of a restless crowd, as they get anxious about victory and defeat. There are millions of sports enthusiasts who find poetry right there at that moment. Experiencing such wonder is rooted in painstaking preparation, the key is to plan in advance.
The list of amazing events is long but if you choose wisely, you're in for a great time. There is FIFA U-17 World Cup in Chile, Formula One is Brazil and Polo in Argentina . Here is a list of international sporty events beginning from October 2015 to March 2016. Did we hear you cheer loud?

FIFA U-17 World Cup 
Region:Chile 
Dates : October 17 - 8 November, 2015
The FIFA U-17 World Cup 2015 will be the fourth FIFA tournament to take place in Chile, a football-mad country in which matches attract large crowds nationwide. A total of 52 games across 10 venues including Vina del Mar, Santiago, Talca, Chillan, Concepcion and Puerto Montt amongst others.
Places of interest: 
- Atacama Desert : The Atacama Desert has unique rock formations. Tourist who wish to explore the desert stay in the town of San Pedro de Atacama. There is a specially commissioned ESO hotel, which is reserved for astronomers in the desert.
- Patagonia : This region comprises the southern section of the Andes mountains as well as the deserts, steppes and grasslands. The other popular tourist attractions include the Perito Moreno Glacier, the Valdes Peninsula, the Argentine Lake District and Ushuaia and Tierra del Fuego .
